item.title: 【Helpdesk】How to split songs in vinyl albums without quality lose?
item.description:
Hello, how can I split vinyl albums, where all songs are as one file?

I tried CUE Splitter, Total Audio Converter, MediaHuman Audio Converter, Medieval CUE Splitter and foobar 2000, but most of them work normally only with 16/44.1, but what if I want to split 24/192 album without quality lose?

Some 192kHz I can split with CUE file, but I get quality lose from 5000k to 2000k when song is splitted.

Are there any guides to get result without lose in quality?
item.author: WeLoveLOONA
